Package it.polimi.ingsw.commons.message

Class PlayMessagesFabric

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.commons.message.PlayMessagesFabric
public abstract class PlayMessagesFabric extends Object
Fabric class needed to build Play messages.
